page.title: 20FREE LOCAL NEWSPAPERS
page.content: In{Garforth}we receive two free{ {newspapers}each week. One is the{ {'Skyrack Express',}the other is the{ {'Leeds Weekly News'.}Both contain some local{news}and{photographs}and many{ {advertisements.}My mother is a{ {supervisor}for the{delivery}of one of these papers. She distributes bundles of them on Thursdays to the teenage boys and girls who then deliver them on Friday or Thursday to homes in Garforth, free of charge. If they do not do the job correctly my mum 'sacks'{dismisses}them. They sometimes also deliver advertising leaflets at the same time. They{earn}lp. per newspaper, so for 325 newspapers delivered a person would earn Â£3.25.
